name: Football Hit Dunk 2018
description:
With football season around the corner in 2018, are you ready to basket some balls in this tap tap dunk football 2018. Grab the football, hoop and shoot into the basket. New hot trend in Arcade games with tap tap gameplay to hit and basket the football.


Join the players in the stadium and let's shoot some hoops. Make the perfect ball shot and hit perfect shots for maximum scores. Become the arcade game star with perfection.
Hoop unlimited baskets to score high. Tap screen to control the football and bounce it with perfection within given time to make the shot. Challenge yourself and enjoy this fun game with tap tap high speed arcade style.
